attributes.action: Abolish the Severn Crossing M4 Toll
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The charge for a car now to cross the M4 Severn Crossing to Wales West bound is £5.40, this charge is very unfair.
Many people cannot afford to cross and see family and friends.
It is requested that the Goverment Abolish the charge for cars crossing the Serven M4 Bridge as a urgent matter
